divs: Sighting DetailsI was asleep one night and had a dream that something came into my room and sat near the head of the bed, talking to me while I was sleeping. I then talked back to it in my dream and woke myself up doing so. In that instance I heard a motorized sound and then the bathroom door slammed shut VERY hard. My father and kids all woke. Has anyone out there have this exsperience?
